snippet: There were deals like an $11 kayak and a $9 projector, and while Walmart blamed a technical error, it did not say whether it would honor the deals.
abstract: Certain products on Walmart's Web site display wildly low prices, such as $11 kayak and $579 projector available for $8.85; store blames technical error, but does not say whether it will honor deals.
lead_paragraph: There were deals like an $11 kayak and a $9 projector, and while Walmart blamed a technical error, it did not say whether it would honor the deals.

headline.main: Error Creates Deals Too Good to Be True on Walmart’s Site
headline.print_headline: Error Creates Deals Too Good to Be True on Walmart’s Site
